content: by stephanie yoo for the lamb & kid this snuggly colorwork infinity cowl is knit in the round and grafted resulting in a sturdy and cozy cowl that will keep you warm throughout the coldest months samples shown the lamb & kid tod in colors olives mc and radish cc and the lamb & kid tod in colors kid mc and three dog night cc sizes one size finished measurements approx 9 5 / 24 cm tall by 29 / 74 cm circumference after assembly before assembly your piece will be a tube with a 19 / 48 cm circumference x approx 31 / 79 cm long *note when cowl is assembled double thickness of fabric shortens circumference slightly * yarn requirements *please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make * the lamb & kid tod 65% yak 35% cashmere 150 yards per 50 grams 4 skeins total 3 skeins in mc and 1 skein in cc or dk-weight yarn in the following amounts mc 395 yards / 360 m cc 100 yards / 92 m needles *needles listed are suggested * gauge needle us 8 5mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle spare needle in same size as gauge needle for assembly *optional needle one size larger than gauge needle for colorwork motif sections * tools approx 2 yards smooth waste yarn crochet hook in similar size to gauge needle darning needle bor marker gauge approx 19 sts and 26 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch in the round after blocking
